Control Name: Controls Access Credentials to Protected Assets—Information asset access credentials are created based on an authorization from the system's asset owner or authorized custodian.

control_attributes.Control: Controls Access Credentials to Protected Assets—Information asset access credentials are created based on an authorization from the system's asset owner or authorized custodian.
control_attributes.SubCategory:
CC6.2 Prior to issuing system credentials and granting system access, the entity registers and authorizes new internal and external users whose access is administered by the entity. For
those users whose access is administered by the entity, user system credentials are removed when user access is no longer authorized.
